#include <iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main() {
            string s;
            cin>>s;
            for (int i=0;i<s.length();i++)
            {
                if (int(s[i])>87)
                s[i] = char(int(s[i])+3-26);
                else
                s[i] = char(int(s[i])+3);
            }
            cout<<s<<endl;
	return 0;
}
